entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is there any way to add key annotations in cs files generated from Grpc proto files? #28112
  • How to add a custom MemberTranslator for DateOnly #28111
  • EF Core fails to track property if it's set up as JSON #28109
  • EFCore 7.0-preview.4 with precompiled Model: The binary operator Equal is not defined for the types 'System.Int64' and 'System.Nullable`1[System.Int64]' #28108
  • EF Core migration alters field lengths in unrelated AspNet tables #28106
  • Entity framework .net6 generating wrong queries with old column names that don't exist anymore #28107
  • `dotnet-ef migrations add` starts entire application when CreateHostBuilder method is not present #28105
  • SQL Server: Translate statistics aggregate functions #28104
  • Consider implementing GetAsyncEnumerator extension method on IQueryable<T> to simplify consuming EF queries with await foreach #28103

Closed

  • Exclude LazyLoader when use System.Text.Json #28083
    7.0.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Custom aggregate translations #28110

Merged

  • add support for System.Text.Json not including LazyLoader #28084
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Query: Use GetDiscriminatorValue for TPT and TPC #28070
  • Query: Provide a way to translate aggregate methods on top level #28102
    auto-merge
